COMMENT_TX: ej,bradm001,P,holbs901,Called third strike Milton Bradley ejected by HP umpire Sam Holbrook
ej,aloum001,P,diazl901,Called third strike Moises Alou ejected by HP umpire Laz Diaz

ej,bradm001,P,craft901,Arguing with umpire at start of at bat ej,tracj101,M,westj901,Claimed Bradley was provoked by Craft $Milton Bradley ejected by HP umpire Terry Craft as he came to bat; he had to be restrained by Manager Jim Tracy; Bradley removed his batting gloves and left them with his helmet and bat near the plate raised his hands over his head and went to the dugout; he then took a ball bag and emptied it onto field, threw the bag and threw a ball into deep left field; while the batboys picked up the balls, Tracy was ejected by 2B umpire Joe West; Tracy claimed Bradley was provoked
$Vizcaino left game injured arm and Beltran left game with injured leg (he had fouled a ball off his right knee in the first inning)
Finley left game with injured leg
$Penny left with badly strained right biceps
$Bell had back spasms as he hit the ball, fell in batter's box & lay there as play was made to retire him
Off padding at very top of wall
ej,wallt001,C,barkl901,Balls and strikes Dodgers coach Tim Wallach ejected by HP umpire Lance Barksdale
ej,bautd001,P,fleta901,Called third strike Danny Bautista ejected by HP umpire Andy Fletcher
$Larry Walker called out on appeal for missing 2B on what had been a clean single to right by Pujols
$Greene injured on this play; left after end of inning
$Greene left game with broken right index finger; out for season
$Milton Bradley seemed to lose the ball in the lights

ej,bradm001,P,joycj901,Threatening fans after bottle thrown $someone threw a plastic bottle at Bradley from the stands; Milton Bradley picked up the bottle and angrily approached the stands and yelled at a fan; he slammed the bottle into the front row of the seats; several teammates came out to calm him down; Bradley continued to scream at the fans and was ejected by 2B umpire Jim Joyce; as Bradley left the field he took his hat and jersey off and gestured towards the booing fans behind the Dodger dugout
